snippet: Postal customers bemoan service delays as cuts loom, stores work to lure online shoppers offline, Chevy Spark ditches the CD player and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
abstract: Postal customers bemoan service delays as cuts loom, stores work to lure online shoppers offline, Chevy Spark ditches the CD player and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.

headline.main: Thursday Reading: As Cuts Loom, Postal Service Customers Bemoan Delays
